statement.p: The four sequential sides of a quadrilateral have lengths \displaystyle{a}={4.9}, \displaystyle{b}={7.6}, \displaystyle{c}={10.2}, and \displaystyle{d}={13.3} (all measured in yards). The angle between the two smallest sides is \displaystyle\alpha={93}^\circ.
What is the area of this quadrilateral?
